short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Slope calculator finds the slope of the line by using two points & line equation method.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Slope calculator finds the steepness of the line by taking the coordinate points of x and y. The slope is helpful in finding the equation of line through slope-intercept form and point-slope form. This slope finder will give you the result of:
Slope of a line
Angle of a line
X-intercept of a line
Y-intercept of a line
Graph
Now you can get access to an online slope calculator by downloading its extension to avoid searching for a slope calculator or entering the URL of the tool. This extension is helpful for students and teachers to learn and understand how to evaluate the slope of a line.
You have to click the extension of the slope calculator and a pop-up screen will appear.
